subject: Nothin'!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
--_bcca6185-4a4a-442f-9817-bca06cee551c_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


This is what troubles me, I get these supposed Earthquake predictions, the=
 last one fairly specific, and --nothin'! It was supposed to be for China, =
today. That's what I try to get across, you can't take this shit like it's =
written in stone, or some kind of friggin' gospel, as most seem prone to do=
. So far, irregardless of how clear the voice is, or what method is used, t=
he only thing that can be said with certainty is that they consistently lie=
! Personally I seem to get just enough "truth" to keep me hooked. I don't t=
hink you can say with any certainty it's sprits of the deceased, at least n=
ot all of it, there's that level of deception that I don't kow what do to w=
ith. When someone tells me they have the knowledge to know what questions t=
o ask to verify the personality, I have to conclude they are absolutely clu=
eless. I don't care how many books they've written, or how many "universiti=
es" they've given. When something knows how you think, what you are perceiv=
ing, and how it's being perceived, you can't prevent yourself from being de=
ceived, or more like played with. I know I'll be deceived, and tricked, and=
 I tell them have fun with that, cuz I don't really care. I'm not after any=
 particular spirit, or piece of knowledge.    When these voices tell someon=
e not to share the information, that's even thinner ice to on!  I still, ev=
eryday, question the value of this work, and if it warrents continuing. I c=
an do this on my own, but I don't want to drag the unitiated into hell with=
 me! I find the communication mode itself facsinating, and don't expect tha=
t profound paranormal knowledge others seem to seek. I don't care who is ta=
lking through the box.  I think those seeking those bits of profound knowle=
dge, or secrets will get lead right down the rabbit hole.   Frank-S
